outputs.output_descr: This project assists Ethiopia, Kenya,Tanzania,Mauritius,Zambia & Mozambique to create an 'operational Clean Development Mechanisms framework' -an environment in which public institutions are able to effectively interact with the private sector to jointly develop Clean Development Mechanism projects.

project_descr: Regional Clean Development Mechanism Capacity Building Project for the Sub Saharan Africa
project_title: Regional CDM Capacity Bldg proj. for Sub-Saharan Africa
